A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An epic betrayal to all Star Wars fans. Unless you are under the age of 13 and have never seen any of the Stars Wars movies you should save yourself the heartache and avoid this movie at all costs. Seriously. I usually don’t write movie reviews\, and I’m not a hardcore Star Wars purist (I loved ep VII and Rogue One and I thought the prequels weren’t that bad)\, but as a lifelong Star Wars fan I have to warn my fellow geeks. I repeat: This movie will destroy the Stars Wars franchise for you.
